channel.title: Random Dudes with Random Brews
channel.description: Just a bunch of millennial's drinking craft beer. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/random-dudes-with-random-brews/support

item.title: Ep.8 - WebMDead
item.description:
In this episode the guys discuss everything that's medically wrong with them. And why moving out of state is the move. 

Remember to always drink responsibly!

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/random-dudes-with-random-brews/support

item.title: Ep.7 - Sleeping On the Job
item.description:
Listen in on this episode to find out what our special guest, AKA our manager, AKA Miranda has to say about certain drug addictions. Thanks for coming on the show and replacing your sleeping fiance. We also discuss whether or not Joker inspires individuals to commit acts of crime. This is a sensitive matter and if anything we say offends you it is not intended to. Please remember to drink responsibly.

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/random-dudes-with-random-brews/support

item.title: Ep.5 - A Little 'Stitious
item.description:
In this episode we come to you live from the 4th dimension. 


Also if you have any topics you'd like us to discuss let us know below in the comments section. 


Please drink responsibly and enjoy this episode.


--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/random-dudes-with-random-brews/support

item.title: Ep.4 - Dirty Deeds Done Cheap
item.description:
Apparently Chris would murder himself in the case of a zombie apocalypse. But what about the rest of us? 

Please drink responsibly and enjoy this episode.

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/random-dudes-with-random-brews/support
